recipesJson.name: Strawberry marshmallow man remix
recipesJson.author: BigRed
recipesJson.description: A remix to strawberry marshmallow man . super good . mix it up !!

reviews.text: This deserves a review so others can catch the inevitable five stars this mix deserves. I’m really loving this mix through and through. I’ve never had the store bought version of this liquid so I can’t compare the two, but what I can say is that this combines the sweetness of the strawberry and the fluffy richness of the marshmallow in a way that makes for a delightful experience altogether. It’s creamy, too, and that is always a huge plus. I love a creamy, sweet, rich and thick vaping experience when it comes to a liquid, and this liquid delivers. Outstanding job.
